channel.title: Kurosawa on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Kurosawa on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Seven Samurai
item.description:
After finishing the movie, I saw a dream resembling Wolf of Wall Street but with a limited palette, and it was unclear who was more high - the main characters or the more normal people around.

My take is that the movie is high. You can see they had fun doing it. It has wisdom elements and construction so I did the second watch/scroll to refine the details there.
